CustomField.description: The last time any type of call was made on this lead (voicemail, attempt, connect, inbound, outbound). Once the lead is converted and if a call is made on it, it will update the Last Call field on the Account.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The last time any type of call was made on this lead (voicemail, attempt, connect, inbound, outbound). Should also be updated on the Account.
CustomField.label: Last Call
